alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Johnson; Magoffin; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Morgan, northwestern Johnson, northwestern Magoffin and south central Elliott Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Well Station, or near West Liberty, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cottle, Matthew and Bloomington around 405 PM EDT. Florress, Cisco, Lenox, Lick Branch and Licksburg around 410 PM EDT. Logville, Haleburg, Elamton, Orient, Plutarch, Tella and Coon around 415 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dingus, Silverhill, Elkfork, Grayfox, Ever, Quod, Steele, Flat Fork, Wheelersburg, Jeptha, Lacey, Minefork, Mima, Moon, Relief, Ophir, Crockett, Gillem Branch, Elna, Redbush, Keaton and Win. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
